pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Zhi1 shi2 Chan3 quan2 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知識產權已經成爲外交外貿領域的重要議題。

sentences.english: The reference and Citation in academic papers closely relate to intellectual property.
sentences.chinese: 學述論著中的參考引文與知識產權有着密切的關係。

sentences.english: Do not violate third-party intellectual property rights, including copyrights and trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 請勿侵害包括版權，商標在內的第三方知識產權。

sentences.english: But concerns over intellectual property rights have proved to be unfounded.
sentences.chinese: 對於知識產權問題存在顧慮顯然多此一舉。

sentences.english: Use the readings and your own assesment to determine the intellectual property regarding software.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀並利用自身的評價來判斷關於軟體的知識產權。

sentences.english: You might find intellectual property encumbrances.
sentences.chinese: 可能會遇到知識產權障礙。

sentences.english: Description: Established jointly by the Customs and Excise Department and the intellectual property rights industry.
sentences.chinese: 由香港海關與知識產權業界共同發起成立。

sentences.english: The company holds exclusive rights in the intellectual property connected with its goods and services.
sentences.chinese: 公司持有貨物和服務知識產權的專屬權。

sentences.english: Does the Shanghai Customs have any local policies, rules, or regulations for dealing with the protection and enforcement of IP rights?
sentences.chinese: 上海海關有沒有保護知識產權的地方性政策和法規？

sentences.english: But hold on: China actually does have intellectual property laws.
sentences.chinese: 請稍安勿躁，中國其實是有知識產權相關法律的。

sentences.english: It is the development trend for countries all over the world to place restrictions on the IPRs abuse.
sentences.chinese: 限制知識產權濫用是當今世界各國的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: There are a variety of small-size apartments, hotels and other property rights of new products.
sentences.chinese: 有各種各樣的小公寓，酒店和其他知識產權的新產品。

sentences.english: However, practically there still is the comportment of abusing intellectual property right.
sentences.chinese: 然而，實踐中卻存在濫用知識產權行爲。

sentences.english: The Database covers online information sources on intellectual property systems in Guangdong Province, Hong Kong and Macao.
sentences.chinese: 涵蓋了粵港澳三地知識產權制度的網上資訊。

sentences.english: The aforesaid person shall be reported to the administrative department of the Intellectual Property Portals for archival filing.
sentences.chinese: 上述人員須報知識產權門戶網站管理部門備案。

sentences.english: Copyrights and other intellectual property law are grounded in this principle.
sentences.chinese: 版權和其他知識產權法即基於這項原則。

definition: patent/sth uniquely enjoyed (or possessed etc) by a certain group of people/monopoly
to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
special administrative region/abbr. for 特別行政區|特别行政区
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
